title: Aamir `manages` to buy daughter Ira's painting
text: Aamir `manages` to buy daughter Ira's painting Monday, 26 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) Aamir Khan is not only Bollywood's perfectionist he is also a doting dad as recently he bought his daughter Ira's one painting during her recent debut art exhibition. Mumbai, Oct 26 : Actor Aamir Khan is a proud daddy! He loved his daughter Ira's first art exhibition and even bought one of her black and white artworks. newKerala.com 2 hours ago - Entertainment Superstar Aamir Khan's daughter Ira is holding her debut art exhibition here and the proud father managed to purchase one painting of hers. The 50-year-old... Mid-Day 3 hours ago - Entertainment Superstar Aamir Khan's daughter Ira is holding her debut art exhibition here and the proud father managed to purchase one painting of hers.
